Package view_controller

package view_controller
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    KeyBoardPane
    This class creates the keyboard that is used in the MainWordleGui pane.
    LoginAndCreatePane
    This class is the login screen that is used in MainWordleGUI.
    MainWordleGUI
     
    StatsPane
    This class creates the statsPane that is used in the MainWordleGUI.
    WordleConsoleGame
    This class is used to create a console game version of wordle.
    WordleGamePane
    This class creates the pane that displays the guesses and the correct and incorrect guesses.
